StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetEnlistedRanks]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT PG.PAY_GRADE_CODE, PG.RANK_CODE AS ID, PG.RANK_CODE + ' - ' + PG.SHORT_DESC AS Descrip.on, PG.TYPE AS Usage FROM dbo.PAY_GRADE PG WHERE PAY_GRADE_CODE BETWEEN 'E1' AND 'E7' ORDER BY PAY_GRADE_CODE END
